trans-unit.source: Returns information about literals used in text commands, data values, and database objects.
trans-unit.target: 傳回文字命令、資料值和資料庫物件中所用常值 (Literal) 的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbLiteral> enumeration returns the following categories of literal information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbLiteral>列舉會傳回下列常值的資訊類別。

trans-unit.source: Category
trans-unit.target: 分類

trans-unit.source: Returns
trans-unit.target: Returns

trans-unit.source: A special character or characters used by text commands, such as the character used to quote identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 特殊字元或文字命令，例如用來識別項加上引號的字元所使用的字元。

trans-unit.source: The character or characters.
trans-unit.target: 字元。

trans-unit.source: A literal data value, such as a character literal in an SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: 常值資料值，例如字元常值中的 SQL 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of the literal in characters, a list of the characters that cannot be used in the literal, and a list of the characters that cannot be used as the first character of the literal.
trans-unit.target: 常值中字元的字元不能用於在常值，清單以及一份不能用做常值的第一個字元的字元長度上限。

trans-unit.source: The name of a database object such as a column or table.
trans-unit.target: 資料庫物件，例如資料行或資料表的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of the name in characters, a list of the characters that cannot be used in the name, and a list of the characters that cannot be used as the first character of the name.
trans-unit.target: 在字元、 不能在名稱中，字元的清單和不能當做名稱的第一個字元的字元清單中名稱的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: Multidimensional restriction columns.
trans-unit.target: 多維度的限制資料行。

trans-unit.source: Restriction values that return information about cubes, dimensions, hierarchies, levels, and members available from a data source; and are treated as literals instead of as search patterns.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源，傳回 cube、 維度、 階層、 層級，以及可用成員的相關資訊的限制值而會被視為常值而不是做為搜尋模式。

trans-unit.source: Most members of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbLiteral> enumeration maps to one of the OLE DB DBLITERAL values that are returned in the DBLITERALINFO structure.
trans-unit.target: 大部分成員<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbLiteral>列舉型別對應至其中一個會傳回 DBLITERALINFO 結構中的 OLE DB DBLITERAL 值。

trans-unit.source: Multidimensional restriction columns are members of schema objects and map to OLE DB for OLAP used by the IDBSchemaRowset interface.
trans-unit.target: 多維度的限制資料行是結構描述物件並對應至 OLE DB for OLAP IDBSchemaRowset 介面所使用的成員。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is generated if the specified literal information is not supported and cannot be returned.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.NotSupportedException>如果不支援指定的常值資訊，而且無法傳回會產生。

trans-unit.source: A binary literal in a text command.
trans-unit.target: 文字命令中的二進位常值。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_BINARY_LITERAL.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_BINARY_LITERAL。

trans-unit.source: A catalog name in a text command.
trans-unit.target: 文字命令中的資料庫目錄 (Catalog) 名稱。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_CATALOG_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_CATALOG_NAME。

trans-unit.source: The character that separates the catalog name from the rest of the identifier in a text command.
trans-unit.target: 將在文字命令中資料庫目錄名稱和識別項其餘部分相分隔的字元。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_CATALOG_SEPARATOR.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_CATALOG_SEPARATOR。

trans-unit.source: A character literal in a text command.
trans-unit.target: 文字命令中的字元常值。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_CHAR_LITERAL.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_CHAR_LITERAL。

trans-unit.source: A column alias in a text command.
trans-unit.target: 文字命令中的資料行別名 (Alias)。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_COLUMN_ALIAS.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_COLUMN_ALIAS。

trans-unit.source: A column name used in a text command or in a data-definition interface.
trans-unit.target: 在文字命令或資料定義介面中所用的資料行名稱。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_COLUMN_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_COLUMN_NAME。

trans-unit.source: A correlation name (table alias) in a text command.
trans-unit.target: 文字命令中的相互關聯名稱 (資料表別名)。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_CORRELATION_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_CORRELATION_NAME。

trans-unit.source: The name of a cube in a schema (or the catalog if the provider does not support schemas).
trans-unit.target: 結構描述中的多維資料集名稱 (如果提供者不支援結構描述，則為資料庫目錄)。

trans-unit.source: A cursor name in a text command.
trans-unit.target: 文字命令中的資料指標 (Cursor) 名稱。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_CURSOR_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_CURSOR_NAME。

trans-unit.source: The name of the dimension.
trans-unit.target: 維度名稱。

trans-unit.source: If a dimension is part of more than one cube, there is one row for each cube/dimension combination.
trans-unit.target: 如果維度是一個以上多維資料集的部分，則每個多維資料集/維度組合會有一個資料列。

trans-unit.source: The character used in a LIKE clause to escape the character returned for the DBLITERAL_LIKE_PERCENT literal.
trans-unit.target: LIKE 子句中所使用的字元，用來逸出傳回給 DBLITERAL_LIKE_PERCENT 常值的字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a percent sign (%) is used to match zero or more characters and this is a backslash (\\), the characters "abc\\%%" match all character values that start with "abc%".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果百分比符號 (%) 是用來符合零或多個字元，並且這是反斜線 (\\)，則字元 "abc\\%%" 會符合所有開頭為 "abc%" 的字元值。

trans-unit.source: Some SQL dialects support a clause (the ESCAPE clause) that can be used to override this value.
trans-unit.target: 某些 SQL 用語支援可以用來覆寫這個值的子句 (ESCAPE 子句)。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_PERCENT_PREFIX.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_PERCENT_PREFIX。

trans-unit.source: The escape character, if any, used to suffix the character returned for the DBLITERAL_LIKE_PERCENT literal.
trans-unit.target: 逸出字元 (如果有)，用來附加傳回給 DBLITERAL_LIKE_PERCENT 常值的字元尾碼。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a percent sign (%) is used to match zero or more characters and percent signs are escaped by enclosing in open and close square brackets, DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_PERCENT_PREFIX is "[", DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_PERCENT_SUFFIX is "]", and the characters "abc[%]%" match all character values that start with "abc%".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果百分比符號 (%) 是用來符合零或多個字元，並且百分比符號是藉由左右方括弧來逸出，則 DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_PERCENT_PREFIX 為 "["、DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_PERCENT_SUFFIX 為 "]"，並且字元 "abc[%]%" 會符合所有開頭為 "abc%" 的字元。

trans-unit.source: Providers that do not use a suffix character to escape the DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_PERCENT character do not return this literal value and can set the lt member of the DBLITERAL structure to DBLITERAL_INVALID if requested.
trans-unit.target: 不使用後置字元來逸出 DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_PERCENT 字元的提供者 (Provider) 不會傳回這個常值，並且可以將 DBLITERAL 結構的 lt 成員設定為 DBLITERAL_INVALID (若有必要)。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_PERCENT_SUFFIX.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_PERCENT_SUFFIX。

trans-unit.source: The character used in a LIKE clause to escape the character returned for the DBLITERAL_LIKE_UNDERSCORE literal.
trans-unit.target: LIKE 子句中所使用的字元，用來逸出傳回給 DBLITERAL_LIKE_UNDERSCORE 常值的字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an underscore (_) is used to match exactly one character and this is a backslash (\\), the characters "abc\\\_ _" match all character values that are five characters long and start with "abc\_".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果底線 (_) 是用來精確符合一個字元，並且這是反斜線 (\\)，則字元 "abc\\\_ _" 會符合所有長度為五個字元並且開頭為 "abc\_" 的字元值。

trans-unit.source: Some SQL dialects support a clause (the ESCAPE clause) that can be used to override this value.
trans-unit.target: 某些 SQL 用語支援可以用來覆寫這個值的子句 (ESCAPE 子句)。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_UNDERSCORE_PREFIX.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_UNDERSCORE_PREFIX。

trans-unit.source: The character used in a LIKE clause to escape the character returned for the DBLITERAL_LIKE_UNDERSCORE literal.
trans-unit.target: LIKE 子句中所使用的字元，用來逸出傳回給 DBLITERAL_LIKE_UNDERSCORE 常值的字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an underscore (_) is used to match exactly one character and this is a backslash (\\), the characters "abc\\\_ _" match all character values that are five characters long and start with "abc\_".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果底線 (_) 是用來精確符合一個字元，並且這是反斜線 (\\)，則字元 "abc\\\_ _" 會符合所有長度為五個字元並且開頭為 "abc\_" 的字元值。

trans-unit.source: Some SQL dialects support a clause (the ESCAPE clause) that can be used to override this value.
trans-unit.target: 某些 SQL 用語支援可以用來覆寫這個值的子句 (ESCAPE 子句)。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_UNDERSCORE_SUFFIX.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_ESCAPE_UNDERSCORE_SUFFIX。

trans-unit.source: The name of the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 階層架構名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the dimension does not contain a hierarchy or has only one hierarchy, the current column contains a null value.
trans-unit.target: 如果維度不包含階層架構，或只具有一個階層架構，則目前的資料行會包含 Null 值。

trans-unit.source: An index name used in a text command or in a data-definition interface.
trans-unit.target: 在文字命令或資料定義介面中所用的索引名稱。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_INDEX_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_INDEX_NAME。

trans-unit.source: An invalid value.
trans-unit.target: 無效的值。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_INVALID.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_INVALID。

trans-unit.source: Name of the cube to which the current level belongs.
trans-unit.target: 目前層級所屬的多維資料集名稱。

trans-unit.source: The character used in a LIKE clause to match zero or more characters.
trans-unit.target: LIKE 子句中所用的字元，用來符合零或多個字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this is a percent sign (%), the characters "abc%" match all character values that start with "abc".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果這是百分比符號 (%)，則字元 "abc%" 會符合所有開頭為 "abc" 的字元。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_LIKE_PERCENT.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_LIKE_PERCENT。

trans-unit.source: The character used in a LIKE clause to match exactly one character.
trans-unit.target: LIKE 子句中所用的字元，用來精確符合一個字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this is an underscore (_), the characters "abc\_" match all character values that are four characters long and start with "abc".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果這是底線 (_)，則字元 "abc\_" 會符合所有長度為四個字元並且開頭為 "abc" 的字元。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_LIKE_UNDERSCORE.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_LIKE_UNDERSCORE。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member.
trans-unit.target: 成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A procedure name in a text command.
trans-unit.target: 文字命令中的程序名稱。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_PROCEDURE_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_PROCEDURE_NAME。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The character used in a text command as the opening quote for quoting identifiers that contain special characters.
trans-unit.target: 在文字命令中所用的字元，做為加註引號於含有特殊字元之識別項的左引號。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_QUOTE_PREFIX.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_QUOTE_PREFIX。

trans-unit.source: The character used in a text command as the closing quote for quoting identifiers that contain special characters.
trans-unit.target: 在文字命令中所用的字元，做為加註引號於含有特殊字元之識別項的右引號。

trans-unit.source: 1.x providers that use the same character as the prefix and suffix may not return this literal value and can set the member of the DBLITERAL structure to DBLITERAL_INVALID if requested.
trans-unit.target: 使用相同字元做為前置詞和尾碼的 1.x 提供者可能不會傳回這個常值，並且可於請求時將 DBLITERAL 結構的成員設定為 DBLITERAL_INVALID。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_QUOTE_SUFFIX.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_QUOTE_SUFFIX。

trans-unit.source: A schema name in a text command.
trans-unit.target: 文字命令中的結構描述名稱。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_SCHEMA_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_SCHEMA_NAME。

trans-unit.source: The character that separates the schema name from the rest of the identifier in a text command.
trans-unit.target: 在文字命令中將結構描述名稱和識別項其餘部分相分隔的字元。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_SCHEMA_SEPARATOR.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_SCHEMA_SEPARATOR。

trans-unit.source: A table name used in a text command or in a data-definition interface.
trans-unit.target: 在文字命令或資料定義介面中所用的資料表名稱。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_TABLE_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_TABLE_NAME。

trans-unit.source: A text command, such as an SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: 文字命令，例如 SQL 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_TEXT_COMMAND.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_TEXT_COMMAND。

trans-unit.source: A user name in a text command.
trans-unit.target: 文字命令中的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_USER_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_USER_NAME。

trans-unit.source: A view name in a text command.
trans-unit.target: 文字命令中的檢視表名稱。

trans-unit.source: Maps to DBLITERAL_VIEW_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 會對應至 DBLITERAL_VIEW_NAME。
